properties.entry: INSERT INTO MEMBER VALUES(SEQ.MEMBER_NO.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, DEFAULT)
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_EMAIL = ? AND SECESSION_FL = 'N'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_NICK = ? AND SECESSION_FL = 'N'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID = ? AND SECESSION_FL = 'N'
